installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Ree6 Backend installscript
#
#Variables
clear
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'

export HOME=/mnt/server

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Ree6 Backend installscript${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}installing dependencies...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
apt update
apt install -y curl jq
echo -e "${GREEN}..done..\n${NC}"

## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/Ree6-Applications/Webinterface/releases/latest")
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/Ree6-Applications/Webinterface/releases")

MATCH=Webinterface-Backend-


if [ -z "${VERSION}" ] || [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i "${MATCH}" | head -1 )
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "${VERSION}" == "${VERSION_CHECK}" ]; then
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${RELEASES} | jq -r --arg VERSION "${VERSION}" '.[] | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i "${MATCH}" | head -1)
    else
        echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}defaulting to latest release...${NC}"
        echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
        DOWNLOAD_URL=$(echo ${LATEST_JSON} | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i *.jar)
    fi
fi

## Backend Setup
[ ! -d /mnt/server ] && mkdir -p /mnt/server

if [ ! -z "${DOWNLOAD_URL}" ]; then 
    if curl --output /dev/null --silent --head --fail ${DOWNLOAD_URL}; then
        echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
        echo -e "${GREEN}link is valid.${NC}"
        echo -e "${GREEN}setting download link to: ${YELLOW} ${DOWNLOAD_URL} ${NC}"
        echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------\n${NC}"
        DOWNLOAD_LINK=${DOWNLOAD_URL}
    else
        echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
        echo -e "${RED}link is invalid closing out${NC}"
        echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
        exit 2
    fi
fi

cd /mnt/server
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Installing/Updating Backend...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------\n${NC}"

if [ -f Webinterface.jar ]; then
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Updating Webinterface.jar to latest version... ${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}(Old version can be found at ${RED}Webinterface.jar-old) ${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    mv -f Webinterface.jar Webinterface.jar-old
    echo -e "${GREEN}..done..\n${NC}"
fi

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Running: curl -sSL -o Webinterface.jar ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

echo -e ""
curl -sSL -o  Webinterface.jar ${DOWNLOAD_LINK}
echo -e "${GREEN}..done..\n${NC}"

if [ -f config.yml ]; then
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}Updating config.yml to latest version... ${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}(Old version can be found at ${RED}config.yml-old) ${NC}"
    echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
    mv -f config.yml config.yml-old
    echo -e "${GREEN}..done..\n${NC}"
fi

echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Backend Successfully Installed! ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
